CustomField.formula: AND( Total_Purchased_VG_Count__c <= 2, Total_Purchased_AG_Count__c <= 2, Total_Purchased_CM_Count__c <= 2, Total_Purchased_EM_Count__c <= 2, OR( Number_of_Vehicles__c <= 2, ISBLANK(Number_of_Vehicles__c), ISNULL(Number_of_Vehicles__c) ), Lifetime_Purchases__c > 0, Record_Type_Stamp_for_Dupes__c = "Fleet" )
CustomField.label: Micro-Fleet Formula
